long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The ViewWorld platform helps you document and publish results based on real world data collection. Optimal for data collection as part of Monitoring and Evaluation (M&E) in projects, but can be used in almost any organisational setting.

Collected information is displayed real-time on web platforms or available for further modeling via desktop software. The concept of gathering data using smartphones has been developed with international NGOs.

Using this application requires that you create an account at ViewWorld.net. To collect data on the go you need a smartphone with the ViewWorld app installed.
